translations: [数][统计]百分位数值；[数][统计]百分位数（percentile 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Histograms, Percentiles, Mean, Median, Variance, etc.
sentences.translation: 质方图，百分位数，平均，中位数，变异…等。

sentences.sentence: By default, a percentile report shows the 85th, 90th, and 95th percentiles.
sentences.translation: 默认条件下，一个百分比报告显示了85th, 90th与95th百分比。

sentences.sentence: Which my score report will have me know means 99, 95, and 99th percentiles .
sentences.translation: 而我的分数报告将有我知道，是指99 ， 95和第99百分位数。
